initWithSRP

public byte[] initWithSRP()
Generates own public and private key pair according to SRP 6a

Returns:
client public key A

computeSessionKey

public byte[] computeSessionKey(byte[] externalPublic,
                                byte[] identity,
                                byte[] salt,
                                byte[] password)
Derives a session key using provided credentials as defined in srp 6a and computes authentication data to be sent to SE

Parameters:
externalPublic - Applet side public key B
identity - user identity
salt - salt received from the Applet
password - secure channel password
Returns:
authentication Data (M1) of Application side, null if externalPublic is 0

verifySEResponse

public boolean verifySEResponse(byte[] seResponse)
Authentication: Verifies Authentication Response (M2) received from the Applet side

Parameters:
seResponse - authentication response from the Applet M2
Returns:
true if authentication is successful, false otherwise

getSessionKey

public byte[] getSessionKey()
returns final key derived according to SRP-6a

Returns:
key buffer
